W : That will be fine ; in the meantime you should try to take it easy . Don ' t press your ear and don ' t have water in when you take a shower . M : Do I have to bring something when I ' m seeing the doctor , since I have never seen a doctor in Canada . W : For foreign visitors , I guess you may bring your passport for the hospital registration . M : Yes , I will . Thank you for your help . W : Thanks for calling . See you .
